title: Owning all available icons
body:
Hi Summoners!

I own all available icons in-game, please, I know, I don't need a lecture or anything. I've played this game since season 2 and put a lot of time and money into one account. The reason I know this is due to the "Random Icon Chest" you can purchase in the store. When I hit it again, It tells me  "my pool needs to be at least 1 and I am at 0".

The reason for this discussion: ****Does this mean I can't receive anymore icons, like I hit a max limit?****

If anyone knows the answer to this, please let me know! 

Thanks!
- Avatar

replies.body: Ahhhh so you don't have an Icon Limit, but in order to get one of the random icons you need to not own at least 1 of the possible icons. Basically what this means is, when you do the Random Icon you get one from a list. Right now, you earn everything on that list xD!
I mean obviously you cant receive any more icons if you own them all.
